title: Holy, these Nidalee Splash Arts o_O

replies.body: Glad you guys like them! As someone who was only playing LoL and not working on LoL when these were announced it feels surreal to be the producer on these splashes!
you should make the hat on the last one Rabadons Deathcap

These are some kick-ass splash arts! The lighting and perspective on Leopard Nidalee, the detail in the crystal embedded in Pharaoh Nidalee's boots and the itty bitty Kitty Kat in Bewitching Nidalee are amazing! Leopard Nid looks almost like a photo of a cosplay at a quick glance. Seriously, what an awesome job. The splash arts themselves make me value the skins more. Do you have an online portfolio of other artworks you've done?
I'm not the artist, just the producer. I wish I could draw this well :). These were done by multiple artisits not a singular artist. And yeah, the illustration team here at Riot are preeeety good.

Any chance we could have this splash art updated:

http://imgur.com/qaBURV3

Looks like a 14yr old drew it for high school art class. Body proportions are all wrong.
{{champion:83}} skins update? Or is that w/ the rework?
That's the plan! :)
{{champion:83}}  is getting a rework? Hmm I need to get on boards more lol.
pharaoh is next level tbh

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Trds6AcM,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-05-25T00:15:45.251+0000)
>
> Glad you guys like them! As someone who was only playing LoL and not working on LoL when these were announced it feels surreal to be the producer on these splashes!

You made them? Holy cow, you need to do more splash arts! You're really talented.

Didn't make them, just the producer on them. Most were done by different artist with the exception of Snow Bunny and Pharoah which were mostly worked on by the same artist. Pharoah was started by one artist but finished by the same artist that did Snow Bunny.
Do you know when twitch splashes will be updated? After Ryze and Yorick I'd think but any eta?

It's hard to say when these will be released as they are lower priority then anything else Champion Update is making. For example, we wanted to get these out before Taric, but we weren't quite there and had to put them on hold to get Taric and the Mage Update out, then when that settled down we got back to the Trundle/Trist/Nidalee splashes. We are currently focused on Ryze and all his splashes though we have started really early ideation on Sion Splashes. Sion and Twitch's will for sure be after Ryze but I can't say how long after. The good thing is that Yorick has very few skins so that should give us a bit of bandwidth after Ryze. Warwick has A LOT of skins as well though so there will be a point we have to start to focus on that.

There are also a few more 1 off splashes that we have at 70-90% complete that we didn't get to in the last round of random 1 offs (Olaf, PAX sivir for example) So I would to expect to see a few more random 1 offs here and there too.
Do you know if there's an ETA on Ryze's champion update? Like, is he after the next revealed champion, or after the one following that?

i for one don't care who gets their splash art updates before whom. I just enjoying seeing them.

keep up the good works art dudes.
So you're the artist? Can you confirm if Fiora's are being worked on? it was announced she was getting them, so are they gonna be shown soon?

He's the product manager so he confirms anything that will be released to live servers in relation to merchandise. Ex: Anything you can buy with $.
So while he's not the artist, he could tell you what's up next and what was previously mentioned was that after Nidalee, Sion would be up.

You are correct that I am a Producer and not the Artist, though your perception of what a Product Manager does is incorrect. I don't really do anything regarding merchandise or $. I manage the products that the Champion Update Team works on throughout development, when they release and even tracking how they do after release. These skin splash updates, the big VGU's like Taric & The Roster projects are all products the Champion Update Team makes. For more context into what a Product Manager at Riot does see my 2 posts below

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/HPUL4OPW-i-just-saw-the-tristana-splash-updates?comment=00000003000000000000

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/BJ5GyLKZ-meddler-do-you-guys-ever-rework-a-champion-because-theyre-boring?comment=000200040001
I'm a nidalee main now.

No exaggeration these might be the best splashes they've ever released.

They're all beautiful.

> [{quoted}](name=Kella,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Trds6AcM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-24T22:33:48.505+0000)
>
> No exaggeration these might be the best splashes they've ever released.
> 
> They're all beautiful.

{{champion:6}} is more beautiful :)
Dem feet in French Maid Nida.

I'm hoping the in game skin models get some texture updates as well. Last time I played Snow Bunny {{champion:76}} (which btw is a very misleading name Rito >.>) her clothes were still pink and Pharaoh Nid does sort of look like that, but with more faded colors.
If they fix the colour I would definitely buy the skin
Meanwhile http://i.imgur.com/gg5uUiX.jpg http://www.mobafire.com/images/champion/skins/portrait/annie-goth.jpg http://img3.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/card-asset/wallpaper_165px_10272.jpg
Those are not updated.
actually those are the ones they released recently.

All of which are only placeholders.

But it begs the question why they even were released in the first place, being so horrible as they are.
The Twitch one isn't that awful, at least he doesn't have the old 10 meter long nose anymore.
Makes me giddy for Sion's updates.
THANK GOD, YOU UPDATED PHARAOH NIDALEE!!!!! That was the ugliest splash art in the entire game.
So does the person who made the French Maid Nidalee splash art have a foot fetish?

hey, there's nothing wrong with that ;)

To each their own XD
So maid Nidalee become sexier now?

Trundle had me questioning my sexuality, but after seeing Nidalee's new splashes, i'm back on track.

Wait, no, im still questioning if its okay to have feelings for a video game troll.
Upvoted for . . . personality.
These new splashes are absolutely breath taking. First Tristana and Trundle, now Nidalee.. I can't wait to see who's next!! (I'm really waiting for Evelynn) ;)
I like thae cat in the last one, sad that it prolly wont make it into the loading screen slice
And the kitty in French maid
French maid and Pharoah have me feeling some kind of way right now

I love the new splashes. But I can't help but notice something. Is it just me, or has Nidalee gotten whiter and whiter over the years? I've been playing league for a long time and Nidalee and Karma were the only two with any "color" to them. And now...

Depends on the skin. Base, French Maid and Pharaoh are all pretty dark, but the others are quite pale. Cougar's kind of in between.

But yeah, as the other guy said. Even if Nid has gotten less dark, we've got Lucian, Ekko and Taliyah now.

that's still a really really low amount of non-white champions. don't get me wrong, I appreciate riot becoming more diverse with their champions, but seeing as though nidalee isn't white in her original splash, it would be nice if she maintained that skin color in all her splashes (especially in her pharaoh one...seeing as though Egyptians of that time were far from white).
She needs a sexy tan or straight african lol

Now, Nidalee is really deserving of her title "The Bestial Huntress".
Amazing work! I'm so hyped about the splash updates!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

#Bewitching Nidalee splash reminds me so much of Blair from Soul Eater.
My only complaint is that French Maid Nidalee would be the most useless maid ever, she's just sitting around drinking lemonade.
i like Maid Nidalee alot

I think I see kitty Katarina in the background of the last one. 
Also a strange blob. And that blob is definitely not Blitzcrank.
I am IN LOVE with the new leopard splash omg
The Egyptian one really screams... seductive domination...
